check_alive: Check if the units are alive
show_info_archive_selected_recipe_error: Please select a recipe to archive
show_info_use_selected_recipe_error: The selected recipe does not contain servo steps
show_info_submit_new_recipe_error: Name and comment fields should not be empty
show_info_update_recipe_error: Please select a recipe to update
show_info_update_recipe_name_empty: Name and comment fields should not be empty
show_info_edit_recipe_no_selected: Please select a recipe before trying to edit it
show_info_edit_recipe_no_data: Please select a recipe that contains servo steps
show_info_all_units_proced_succes: The selected recipe has been loaded into the database
show_info_all_units_proced_fail: Could not load data from all units to the database
no_recipe_to_load_data_into: No recipe or selected structure to load data into
show_info_Could_not_load_data_from: Try again, could not load data from
show_info_from_all_units_processed_succe: The selected recipe has been loaded into the database
show_info_from_all_units_processed_not_s: Could not load data from all units to the database
show_info_to_all_units_processed_success: The selected recipe has been loaded into the Units
show_info_to_all_units_processed_not_suc: Could not load data from the database to all units
select_unit_to_download_header: Fill in everything before saving it
error_with_database: There was a error with the database check the logs
show_info_opcua_connection_error: Could not connect to the OPCUA server
